title: Great. Paycheck issues
body:
When I first started working I had two options for pay. Direct deposit or a card.

My account was disabled at the time so I took the card and was going to wait till I got paid to reopen the account.

I actually ended up liking the card until I started running into issues with it. So I got my account fixed and got direct deposit set up.

I was supposed to get paid Friday morning and still haven't received pay on either my account or the pay card.

Couldn't call the bank yesterday and the manager was off on weekends.


AAAAAAHHHHHHHHH
